mapper.select: SELECT rbpr.reviewBatchProjectId FROM review_batch_project_relation rbpr INNER JOIN review_batch_project_eperson_relation rbper ON rbper.reviewBatchId = rbpr.reviewBatchId AND rbper.reviewBatchProjectId = rbpr.reviewBatchProjectId AND rbper.epersonId = #{userId} WHERE rbpr.reviewBatchId = #{reviewBatchId}

SELECT rbpr.* FROM review_batch_project_relation rbpr INNER JOIN review_batch_project rbp ON rbp.id = rbpr.reviewBatchProjectId AND rbp.projectId = #{projectId} WHERE rbpr.reviewBatchId = #{reviewBatchId}
